default.2WaysLS: Heavily discounted rates on shipping labels thanks to our volume accounts with world class carriers and partners
default.2WaysLSTwo: Your own local US and Canadian address for fast low cost cross-border transfers
default.Account-param: Join us for great benefits by getting your Free Account right now! Enjoy exclusive access to our specialized services, unique features and unmatched prices
default.CrossBorder-params:
With our Cross-Border Mailbox service you receive your
packages and documents within their originating country in the
most convenient, fast and economical way. With your ShipLink
address you can make purchases online at your favorite stores,
subscribe to magazines, receive correspondence and much more
without the extra costs of international shipping and
brokerage surcharges for items worth less than $800.
default.ls1: Register for free and get your new shipping address to receive your purchases online.
default.ls2: Shop at your favorite online store and use your new local shipping address
default.ls3: Pick up your purchases at your ShipLink Mailbox branch or Receive them at your door via our cross-border transfer service
default.SignupP:
Join us for great benefits by getting your account right now!
Enjoy exclusive access to our specialized services, unique features and unmatched prices
default.why1-params: With our advanced website platform you can buy, track and control in real time, all in one place.
default.why2-params: Make your payments online for fast collection at branches and terminals.
default.why3-params: You only pay for what it weighs, you do not pay for volumetric weight.
default.why4-params: You accumulate points that you can redeem for discounts on our services.
default.why5-params: Several terminals and branches in the US and Canada at your disposal
default.why6-params: The heavier your package, the cheaper your rate per pound.
default.works3: Print Label, Stick it On, and Ship
default.OWC: Our World Class Partners and Carriers
default.WoW: We only work with the worldâ€™s most reputable carriers

about.Header_Title: We are the best-in-class platform for national and international shipping services. Our many years of experience, customer satisfaction.
about.Mission_param: We make your shipping experience easier for both personal and business through our services and distribution network, offering convenient and economical solutions through our best-in-class service.
about.Other1: World class business model using industry best practices
about.Other3: Established business with over 10 years of experience
about.Other4: Terminals and Service across all North America
about.Service_list1: National and international shipment labels (USPS, CP, DHL, UPS, etc)
about.Service_list2: Sale of shipping and packaging supplies
about.Service_list3: Cross-Border Mailboxes (Import, Export, Internet Purchases, Courier)
about.Service_Param: We are a comprehensive personal and business solutions service provider, helping you optimize and save on your shipping needs through the following services:
about.Vision_param: Our team offers customers consistent first-class service, an organization that is close to its customers and builds long term relationships.
